NY WSC Go2 Mapper

  •  About the application
  •  Disclaimer

Interactive web mapping application used to display Go2 warning messages and field personnel locations. The Go2 system is used by USGS staff to monitor the maintenance of USGS gages.

Suggested Citation

Smith, M.J., Go2 Mapper Web Application, https://doi.org/10.5066/F7R210PG.

Developed by Martyn Smith and Todd Siskin of the NY WSC.
Portions of this application were developed in conjuction with Web Informatics and Mapping (WiM).
Source code available here.
Icons created by David McCulloch, USGS
